quote: For me, however, that beloved, glowing little word happiness has become associated with everything I have felt since childhood upon hearing the sound of the word itself.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness.
author: F. H. Bradley

quote: Happiness is a great power of holiness. Thus, kind words, by their power of producing happiness, have also a power of producing holiness, and so of winning men to God.
author: Frederick William Faber

quote: Happiness is not a matter of events; it depends upon the tides of the mind.
author: Alice Meynell

quote: So many people equate money and success with happiness, especially in the music industry.
author: DJ Jazzy Jeff

quote: Hope is itself a species of happiness, and, perhaps, the chief happiness, which this world affords.
author: William Samuel Johnson

quote: The one happiness is to shut one's door upon a little room, with a table before one, and to create; to create life in that isolation from life.
author: Eleonora Duse

quote: Happiness must be cultivated. It is like character. It is not a thing to be safely let alone for a moment, or it will run to weeds.
author: Elizabeth Stuart Phelps

quote: Too much good fortune can make you smug and unaware. Happiness should be like an oasis, the greener for the desert that surrounds it.
author: Rachel Field

quote: There are people who can do all fine and heroic things but one - keep from telling their happiness to the unhappy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Happiness: an agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: To forget oneself is to be happy.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: A sure way to lose happiness, I found, is to want it at the expense of everything else.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Unquestionably, it is possible to do without happiness; it is done involuntarily by nineteen-twentieths of mankind.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: For this generation, ours, life is nuclear survival, liberty is human rights, the pursuit of happiness is a planet whose resources are devoted to the physical and spiritual nourishment of its inhabitants.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Always leave something to wish for; otherwise you will be miserable from your very happiness.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Experienced happiness refers to your feelings, to how happy you are as you live your life. In contrast, the satisfaction of the remembering self refers to your feelings when you think about your life.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Our vision and commitment is towards the country's progress, its place in the world and the happiness of its people.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: I take it that the good of mankind means the attainment, by every man, of all the happiness which he can enjoy without diminishing the happiness of his fellow men.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Happiness for me is totally just being at peace knowing that, everything I'm doing, God is pleased with that. It's complete peace for me.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: I really believe that being flexible and grateful contributes a lot to your happiness, which contributes to your health and contributes to your look.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Happiness includes chiefly the idea of satisfaction after full honest effort. No one can possibly be satisfied and no one can be happy who feels that in some paramount affairs he failed to take up the challenge of life.
author: Arnold Bennett

quote: I am proud of my kids and happy to brag about their achievements. Their success has been an immense source of happiness for me.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: I'm no expert. I have no psychic powers, and I sure don't possess any secret wisdom. I'm just Janet. I have strengths, weaknesses, fears, happiness, sadness. I experience joy and I experience pain. I'm highly emotional. I'm very vulnerable.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: What is happiness? Happiness, I think, has to come in the beginning, truly, from feeling a sense of well-being within yourself.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: One of the indictments of civilizations is that happiness and intelligence are so rarely found in the same person.
author: William Feather

quote: Everyone can relate to the story of fighting for happiness.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: Software-industry battles are fought by highly paid and out-of-shape nerds furiously pounding computer keyboards while they guzzle diet Coke. The stakes aren't very dramatic. Life? Liberty? The pursuit of happiness? Nope, it's about stock options.
author: Nathan Myhrvold

quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
author: Max Planck

quote: What an uncertain thing, marriage - what an elusive thing, happiness!
author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quote: People say you make your best work when you're in despair and all that, and at your lowest - but for me, I think happiness makes you positive, and I think that's a good creative place to write from.
author: Paul Weller

quote: If thou be industrious to procure wealth, be generous in the disposal of it. Man never is so happy as when he giveth happiness unto another.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: A wise woman never yields by appointment. It should always be an unforeseen happiness.
author: Stendhal

quote: Happiness is not the same as life satisfaction, while neither are identical to what we might call flourishing.
author: Julian Baggini

quote: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Happiness is the freedom of choice. The freedom to choose where to live, what to do, what to buy, what to sell, from whom, to whom, when and how.
author: Eleni Zaude Gabre-Madhin

quote: I believe happiness is a choice. Some days it is a very difficult choice.
author: Steve Gleason

quote: Happiness is perhaps painlessness, a state one rarely appreciates. Happiness, then, is very much like a great talent. It rarely gets appreciated and is taken for granted.
author: Kamal Haasan

quote: Trifles make up the happiness or the misery of human life.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: You find happiness where you find it.
author: Anna Paquin

quote: Love is the most terrible, and also the most generous of the passions; it is the only one which includes in its dreams the happiness of someone else.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: I learned a long time ago that fame and money is not a ticket to happiness.
author: M. Ward

quote: What better is there to sigh for than happiness, yesterday's or tomorrow's.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: The biggest problem is the funerals that don't exist. People call the funeral home, they pick up the body, they mail the ashes to you, no grief, no happiness, no remembrance, no nothing. That happens more often than it doesn't in the United States.
author: Caitlin Doughty

quote: The gods conceal from men the happiness of death, that they may endure life.
author: Lucan

quote: We all have the same destiny. The difference is opening ourselves up to possibilities to joy, hope, and happiness along the way. Give yourself and others a chance to take advantage of what's out there and available.
author: Diane Ladd

quote: Happiness comes only when we push our brains and hearts to the farthest reaches of which we are capable.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: The happiness which is lacking makes one think even the happiness one has unbearable.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: My happiness is being able to present my talents for people to see, and I feel like I'm an ambassador of Thai history and Thai culture on film so that people can see Muay Thai.
author: Tony Jaa

quote: Happiness is different from pleasure. Happiness has something to do with struggling and enduring and accomplishing.
author: George A. Sheehan

quote: You can be happy where you are.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Anything you're good at contributes to happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Eternal principles that govern happiness apply equally to all.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: To buy happiness is to sell soul.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Happiness depends more on how life strikes you than on what happens.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: There is happiness in duty, although it may not seem so.
author: Jose Marti

quote: Happiness comes from the full understanding of your own being.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: It's pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: I love acting. It's my playground, it let's me explore. But my happiness in this world - my level of peace - is never going to be dictated by acting.
author: Chris Evans

quote: The British do not expect happiness. I had the impression, all the time that I lived there, that they do not want to be happy; they want to be right.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Happiness is no laughing matter.
author: Richard Whately

quote: To be obliged to beg our daily happiness from others bespeaks a more lamentable poverty than that of him who begs his daily bread.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: I never was someone who was at ease with happiness.
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: We possess only the happiness we are able to understand.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: If you have easy self-contentment, you might have a very, very cheap source of happiness.
author: Leon Kass

quote: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Happiness seems made to be shared.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: I have to keep reminding myself: If you give your life to God, he doesn't promise you happiness and that everything will go well. But he does promise you peace. You can have peace and joy, even in bad circumstances.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: To describe happiness is to diminish it.
author: Stendhal

quote: Dance is something I really enjoy; it gives me a different kind of happiness, something more spiritual. Plus it's good exercise; I'm happy doing it, and it all shows!
author: Madhuri Dixit

quote: As a man, if you're married, your happiness is with her happiness. If she's unhappy, everything's messed up. It's a woman's world for sure.
author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quote: You look at your bank account, and you see the currency of love and happiness is more important than the currency of money.
author: Richie Sambora

quote: Happiness is composed of misfortunes avoided.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: Life everlasting in a state of happiness is the greatest desire of all men.
author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: Happiness will come from materialism, not from meaning.
author: Andrei Platonov

quote: Joys divided are increased.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Sitting behind the bench at games is the hardest thing I've ever had to go through because basketball is really most of my happiness. So when I can't go out there and exert energy and have fun and things like that, it kind of puts everything else into perspective.
author: Chris Webber

quote: I'd rather be a face for happiness and doing things that you have a passion for, rather than faking it and pretending like I'm this face of women's basketball, when I can't stand the sport at all.
author: Elena Delle Donne

quote: So long as we can lose any happiness, we possess some.
author: Booth Tarkington
